definition: radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]

sentences.english: The humorous rumour has something to do with human humanity and vanity .
sentences.chinese: 那個幽默傳聞丿人類的仁慈和虛榮心有關。

sentences.english: I am felt lonely time can look up to the shy the child.

definition: "fire" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 86), occurring in 熙, 然, 熊 etc
"piece of wood" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 90), mirror image of 片[pian4]
classifier for strips of land or bamboo, shops, factories etc/slit bamboo or chopped wood (dialect)
numeral 4 in Suzhou numeral system 蘇州碼子|苏州码子[Su1 zhou1 ma3 zi5]
"eight" component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 八[ba1]
one of the characters used in kwukyel, an ancient Korean writing system
